There will be another text at noon but hopefully just weekly after that. || (C): More results came in and no BV/yeast either. Waiting for the infection ones still. || (P): I'm good || (P): Who is this? || (C): Can I give you a quick call?  name  here. || (P):  I have to go see a doctor, it be nice to find out what the pain is from || (C): Perfect. Thanks  name . || (C): haven't heard from you yet. how are you? || (P): I'm traveling I'll call when I get home || (P): It's manageable I actually had to get T3's off of someone it still feels the same with the T3's do you think I might be able to get some off of you or do || (C): The swabs done first were negative for infection. How is the pain?  name  here.

children.author: P
children.htmltext: (P): I got my mouse! I am doing better thanks. Just a few nightmares but no more panic attacks || (C):  name  here. You have mouse trauma! || (P): So stressed! There's a mouse in my house

children.htmltext: (C): Keep those germs to your end of the building! || (P): Ok, but I am spreading my anxiety everywhere. children.author: P
children.htmltext: (C): Are you doing okay? || (P): Sorry I had to rebook, I actually just lost my job but health wise I was wondering if you could make an appointment to the dr uptown for me? If not I thi || (P): nk I see you on the 24th || (C): I am so sorry. See you then! Let me know if need a doc to see you. || (P): Yes I was hoping you can help me get an appointment up town? || (P): 5pm tomorrow would work please || (P): Skidegate or whichever is faster right now || (C): Perfect. The door will be locked but I will be there so just ring the doorbell. I will also keep an eye out. Skidegate Health center at 5:00. || (P): It'd be nice to have an appointment with you || (P): K Haawa || (C): Do you prefer QC or Skidegate? || (C): We could do Skidegate tomorrow at 8:30 am or 5:00 PM or Thursday 11:00, 11:30 or 12:00?

children.author: P
children.htmltext: (C): Will be able to get more info to Dr.  name . Thanks. I am sorry to hear not doing well. || (C): Welcome. QC nurses! || (P): Dr  name  - I don't think I can wait 3 years for my knee op. || (C): One of the nurses here. Are you having worse symptoms? || (P): The pain in my knee is increasing but it also seems to be bothering my hip and lower back. 3 years to wait for dr smith seems like too long. || (P): Still doing ok and I am managing - not an emergency || (C): I won't bug you anymore unless you text but I have notified Dr.  name . Do you feel would be better to go through Dr.  name  as quicker? || (C): Dr.  name  likely won't get message until tomorrow. || (C): haven't heard from you yet. how are you? || (P): I received your message- this is awesome || (P): No hurry- just wish dr smith could see me earlier than the 3 year wait - thanks for responding || (C): missed a couple. You are correct. 3 years is completely ridiculous (my words)!

children.author: P
children.htmltext: (P): Thank you. || (C): Great. The referral is in. You should get a call. Likely will not be until fall. || (P): No other symptoms. || (C): If symptoms better off gluten, I would avoid as you are doing. Any stomach symptoms like nausea, diarrhea? || (C): My apologies. I will look into why did not get the flag! We will put in referral for allergist. || (P): I'm good, but waiting for a response from you regard the message I sent you last week

children.htmltext: (P): This is Alana btw. || (P): Never mind. I've decided to call it QC Hospital Link. || (C): Perfect! Can call it whatever you want so you know what it is and if necessary keep private that is clinic (or not). Welcome! || (P): Awesome. What do I call this .. so I can call it something in my contacts.
